extensionDescription.message: This Add-on works by showing a preview before printing. That can be done by clicking the button on the toolbar, shortcut keys or context menu.

works.message: By clicking on the Add-on icon or using the shortcut keys you can have a preview of the page you are accessing before printing, thus providing a paper economy in addition to avoiding repeated impressions, which certainly benefit the nature.

note.message: Note: This Add-on is completely free! Please consider make a small donation or write an review at addons.mozilla.org. Thank you!

bugs.message: If you find any bugs, have any suggestions or some ideas for this Add-on: Please create a new issue.

windows.message: Windows shortcut keys: Ctrl + Shift + U

mac.message: Mac shortcut keys: Command + Shift + U

linux.message: Linux shortcut keys: Ctrl + Shift + U

resources.message: The Add-on currently has the following features:

resources0.message: 1. Click on the button in toolbar to Print Preview

resources1.message: 2. Enable or disable the context menu to Print Preview

resources2.message: 3. Use shortcuts to open the Print Preview

resources3.message: 4. You can edit the shortcuts in about:addons (Firefox version 66.0 or later)

description_contextmenu.message: Allow or not the Context menu

change_shortcut1.message: In your address bar type about:addons

change_shortcut2.message: Click the gear above the installed Add-ons
